name: Alienz
description:
In Alienz you are the alien, protecting your core from an ever growing amount of evil space parasites who want to eat the core!

Controls:

W & S to move up & down

Left mouse button to shoot

Please note that the leaderboard is online but it takes a couple of seconds to update your high score!

This game was made for the ScoreSpace Jam #17.

I made everything myself expect for the music.
